info.description:
Something that i did because i wanted it to be "fullscreen".
Made for Chrome - 1920 x 1080 resolution. Might look broken for smaller resolution
info.additionalInfo:
Something that i did because i wanted it to be "fullscreen".
Chrome - Maximized window - 1920 x 1080 resolution only, Will look broken if you use smaller resolution or resize the window.
